<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Kemeneles](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2479)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 53</row>

**Perception** +9

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +8, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +8, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +8

<row gap="medium">

**Dex** +4

**Con** -2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 (14 without [_mage armor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=176))

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 30
(currently 20)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 18, attack +12
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245)
- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [Mage Armor](/Spells.aspx?ID=176) (already cast), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283)

**Wizard School Spells** DC 18, 1 Focus Point
- **1st**
[Force Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=529)

**[Eschew Materials](/Feats.aspx?ID=634)**   

</column>
